name: RIVER LEATHER BOOTS

name: SUBTITLED VI KHAKI STAINLESS STEEL WATCH
summary: It's time. The AllSaints debut watch collection is here. Explore the urban landscape with the sporty Subtitled Collection. Subtitled VI features a brushed and polished khaki stainless steel case, with a muted gold finish alongside a complementary strap.
description: Matte black dial with khaki indexes
Indexes and numbers are double printed for high quality
Brushed and polished PVD solid stainless steel case
detailsProduct: Face: hardened mineral crystal to withstand scratches
Hands: three eye chronograph quartz movement for precise time keeping
Case: physical vapor deposition (PVD) plated case, creates a durbale, corrosion and tarnish resistant finish. Fine sandblasted khaki aluminum plate
Water resistance: 5 ATM, 160 feet/50 metres. Protected from light rain and perspiration, not suitable for showering. Do not swim or submerge in water
Bracelet: brushed and polished PVD khaki plated 316L stainless steel bracelet
Your Rubaccine watch is warranted by AllSaints under the terms and conditions of this warranty for two years from the date of its purchase
